config.discordintegration.bot_token.tool: API token of a bot from the Discord Developer Portal
config.discordintegration.guild_id.toolt: ID of the guild containing the channels below
config.discordintegration.location_chann: Channel in which to send locations marked using /marklocation
config.discordintegration.screenshot_cha: Channel in which to send screenshots saved with /uploadscreenshot
config.discordintegration.backend_channe: Channel to use for the backend, including image storage (muting it is recommended)
